statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM users
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT MAX(date_joined) FROM users
SELECT MIN(date_joined) FROM users
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'john@example.com'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%doe%'
SELECT AVG(id) FROM users
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%hotmail.com'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie')
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username IS NULL
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM posts;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users RIGHT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1 AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM posts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM posts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(posts.post_id) AS post_count FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, MAX(posts.created_at) AS latest_post FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE posts.post_content LIKE '%example%';
SELECT users.username, COUNT(posts.post_id) AS post_count FROM users LEFT JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE posts.created_at > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT * FROM users UNION SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM users;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, created_at FROM posts;
SELECT * FROM comments;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM comments;
SELECT comment_id, created_at FROM comments;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, posts.post_id, posts.post_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;

SELECT users.username, posts.post_content, comments.comment_text FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id ORDER BY posts.created_at DESC;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(posts.post_id) AS total_posts FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(DISTINCT posts.post_id) AS total_posts FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, AVG(comments.created_at - posts.created_at) AS avg_comment_delay FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, MAX(comments.created_at - posts.created_at) AS max_comment_delay FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE posts.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, posts.post_content FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE posts.created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM comments;
SELECT comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT comment_id, post_id, user_id, comment_date FROM comments WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM likes;
SELECT like_id, post_id, user_id FROM likes WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT like_id, post_id, user_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, c.comment_text, l.like_id FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id JOIN likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id;

SELECT u.username AS user, p.post_content AS post, c.comment_text AS comment, l.like_id AS like FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id JOIN likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(p.post_id) AS total_posts FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT username, COUNT(user_id) AS total_likes FROM users JOIN likes ON users.user_id = likes.user_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT username, MAX(date_joined) AS latest_joined FROM users GROUP BY username;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(DISTINCT l.like_id) AS total_likes FROM users u JOIN likes l ON u.user_id = l.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT username, SUM(CASE WHEN date_joined < '2022-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS before_2022, SUM(CASE WHEN date_joined >= '2022-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS after_2022 FROM users GROUP BY username;
